import React, { useEffect, Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { getSiteImages, getData, metaTags } from "../../helpers/api"; import Services from './home/services'; import Collapsible from 'react-collapsible'; export default function Career(props) { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [state, setState] = useState({ careerPopup: false, publisherPopup: false, contactPopup: false, }); useEffect(() => { getData("career-page").then((data) => { setState({ ...state, content: data.content, metatags: data.metatags, services: data.services, right_faqs: data.right_faqs, left_faqs: data.left_faqs, site_settings: data.site_settings }); setLoading(true); }); }, []); if (loading === false) return
; return (
{metaTags(state.metatags)}

Monetize your space. Leverage your skills.

Whether you're a media vendor, or a business owner driving 500+ monthly visitors to your online or offline locations, Lumicc lets you get started with monetizing your assets in no time with dedicated support.

The first to market, Lumicc is full-service media marketplace bringing a range of creative services and advertising channels under one roof: digital media, print, OOH, radio, DOOH and more.

Lumicc is perfect for:
  • Marketers
  • Content creators & designers
  • Copywriters
  • Street teams
  • Publishers & media owners (Radio, OOH, display, Influencers, DOOH, radio, apps, etc.)
  • and more!

What's your specialty? Contact us to get started!

More affordable

10 - 20% Fee structures

Purpose driven

Weve helped 200,000+ SMEs

Price range

Price range $20 - 10,000+

More meaning. Less stress. Bigger paychecks.

Lumicc puts its customers first, but our partners are equally important to us. Unlike our competitors, our fee structure was built so that vendors get bigger piece of the pie, while ensuring you have access to the same high-quality support we give to our most valued customers. We believe technology should serve humanity, not the other way around.

How it works

At Lumicc, we want to help you get the most out of your passion, so that doing what you love is as fulfilling and rewarding as possible, not draining.

Get in touch

Fill out the contact form on this page, and we'll get back to you within 48 hours to learn more about your services and answer any questions you may have.

well help setup your service listing

One of our team members will help you create your listing, price your services, and help you market and brand your offering, helping you achieve maximum exposure for your service

Get paid

A designated account manager will handle all customer relations on your behalf, and we'll only contact you once an order is placed; so that you can focus on what you do bestthinking creatively and delivering outstanding products and services.

Get started

Frequently Ask Questions
